name: Out of blood (Conjure, Old Dry Witch, Chugar, misabiko)
name_original: Out of blood (Conjure, Old Dry Witch, Chugar, misabiko)
description:
The evil wizard is getting old and needs blood! He called knights, gladiators and mercenaries from all corner of the world to come try and kill him. His evil plan: Drink from gladiators who've been killed by his monsters and delay the inevitable death. * Your life blood is draining with time * Stay alive by sucking blood from dead gladiators * Spawn monsters to kill the gladiators for you * Spawning monsters costs you some of your life blood * In the safe zone, gladiators cannot hit you

Tips: ABS (Always Be Summoning)

Contributors:

  • Soulaha Djenabou Baldé (Chugar) - Game design, programming
  • Yann Dupont (Old Dry Witch Games) - Game design, programming, composing
  • Jason Durand (misabiko) - Game design, programming
